title: How to Download Maplestory

steps.headline: First go to the region that you play MapleStory on.
Click on "Download.
steps.description: The location will vary depending on what region you are playing in.

steps.headline: Check the requirements to play MapleStory.
steps.description: An easy way to check is to use System Requirements lab. Just type in "Maple Story" or select it in the drop down list. After installing it, they will show the results.

steps.headline: Run the setup.
steps.description: Follow the instructions to complete the setup.

steps.headline: Register at the MapleStory website you're playing in, if you haven't already.
